KITE 20.09
  • Reference

Update equilibrium

update_equilibrium.Rd

`update_equilibrium()` updates the equilibrium to a counterfactual situation with new trade costs and/or other changes.

update_equilibrium(
  initial_conditions = NULL,
  tariff = NULL,
  tariff_new = NULL,
  ntb = NULL,
  ntb_new = NULL,
  ntb_change = NULL,
  export_subsidy = NULL,
  export_subsidy_new = NULL,
  consumption_share = NULL,
  factor_share = NULL,
  intermediate_share = NULL,
  trade_elasticity = NULL,
  trade_share = NULL,
  value_added = NULL,
  trade_deficit = NULL,
  max_iterations = 1000,
  tolerance = 1e-04,
  vfactor = 0.1,
  verbose = T
)

Arguments

initial_conditions

Required list of prepared initial conditions, e.g. for GTAP 10.
tariff

Optional data.table of alternative initial tariffs (\(\tau\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
tariff_new

Optional data.table of new tariffs (\(\tau'\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
ntb

Optional data.table of alternative initial non-tariff barriers (\(\kappa\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
ntb_new

Optional data.table of new non-tariff barriers (\(\kappa'\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
ntb_change

Optional data.table of relative change to new non-tariff barriers (\(\kappa' / \kappa\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
export_subsidy

Optional data.table of alternative initial export subsidies (\(\zeta\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
export_subsidy_new

Optional data.table of new export subsidies (\(\zeta'\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
consumption_share

Optional data.table of alternative elasticities of substitution or consumption shares (\(\alpha\)), dimensions: destination x sector.
factor_share

Optional data.table of alternative input factor shares (\(\beta\)), dimensions: country x sector.
intermediate_share

Optional data.table of alternative input-output coefficients (\(\gamma\)), dimensions: country x input_sector x output_sector.
trade_elasticity

Optional data.table of alternative trade elasticities (\(\theta\)), dimensions: sector.
trade_share

Optional data.table of alternative initial trade matrix (\(\pi\)), dimensions: origin x destination x sector.
value_added

Optional data.table of alternative value added (\(w * L\)), dimensions: country.
trade_deficit

Optional data.table of alternative trade balances (\(D\)), dimensions: country.
max_iterations

maximum number of iterations.
tolerance

Tolerance value for iterations.
vfactor

Regulates the "speed" of the adjustment of wages.
verbose

How talkative should the function be?

Value

List of list of data.tables with initial_conditions, model_scenarios and equilibrium_new.

Contents

Developed by Julian Hinz, Hendrik Mahlkow, Anna Jacobs.
